holidays.title: National Macaroon Day
holidays.description: It is soft and a little chewy, more like a cake than a cookie.

holidays.title: Autonomous Vehicle Day
holidays.description: There's a transport revolution on the way, and we are here for it!

holidays.title: National Fisherfolks Day
holidays.description: Grab a bucket and a fishing rod to celebrate National Fisherfolk Day in the Philippines!

holidays.title: National Flip Flop Day
holidays.description: Check out our fun suggestions for making the most of National Flip Flop Day.

holidays.title: National Save Your Hearing Day
holidays.description: End Better Hearing and Speech Month on a high note but at a lower volume.

holidays.title: National Senior Health and Fitness Day
holidays.description: The common goal of this day is to help senior Americans stay fit and healthy.

holidays.title: National Smile Day
holidays.description: Flash your pearly whites with a smile bigger than the Grand Canyon.

holidays.title: National Speak in Complete Sentences Day
holidays.description: Scrap those short-form words, it is time for National Complete Sentences Day!

holidays.title: National Utah Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the 45th state to gain statehood in the U.S.

holidays.title: Necrotizing Fasciitis Awareness Day
holidays.description: This day creates awareness of this disease, which is also known as ‘flesh-eating bacteria.’

holidays.title: Scripps National Spelling Bee
holidays.description: Want to know all about the Scripps National Spelling Bee? We have all the info you need.

holidays.title: Web Designer Day
holidays.description: It’s time for web users to celebrate the brilliant minds who work tirelessly behind the scenes.

holidays.title: What You Think Upon Grows Day
holidays.description: Flip that negativity upside down and look at the brighter side of life.

holidays.title: World No Tobacco Day
holidays.description: Beat that bad habit and say “NO” to tobacco!

holidays.title: World Otter Day
holidays.description: Learn more about these charming critters and what you can do to save them.

holidays.title: World Parrot Day
holidays.description: It’s time to get chatty with our little feathered friends on World Parrot Day!

holidays.title: Azealia Banks’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rapper, music producer, and actor; is there anything Azealia Banks cannot do?

holidays.title: Clint Eastwood’s Birthday
holidays.description: This veteran actor has set the standard for present and future actors.

holidays.title: Colin Farrell’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actor is creating a timeless legacy that will always be relevant.

holidays.title: Mo3’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper can rest knowing his music made an impact worldwide.

holidays.title: Normani’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this pop singer, nothing gets in her way! Celebrate her today!

holidays.title: Waka Flocka Flame’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper and entertainer has established a reputable legacy in his hip-hop career.
